tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I was searching for a Doc on Practo, or someone to guide me with aligners as i was feeling a bit numbness in my upper teeth. I have already visited a local doctor for consultation, but wanted a second opinion to look for some one with best rating so checked the rating and found 2 doctors with best reviews in Delhi/NCR and visited Dr. kalra initially. (Luckily)

I got myself checked in November 2020 and he guided me with best possible options of how to fix my teeth with all possible options for braces and future plans including monetary saving options.
I had some personal concerns so i went with Invisalign braces which he ordered from overseas as i thought of undergoing the transparent ones as per my case.
Its been almost 6 months and i have atleast 1 more year to go, but i can see the results and how its progressing.

He is really a nice guy to interact with and he takes care of your health concerns proactively and answers all your queries/doubts. I never faced any issues while reaching out to him on phone directly or while rescheduling. Moreover i was mostly late but never faced any changes in his behavior towards me. (Sorry doc)
I can not say that he is the only best doctor out there or only option for your dental care because i don’t know about others as luckily i met him initially, but i would certainly say that he is an expert in his field and turned out to be the best doc for me and my dental care which should be same for others too.

I still have atleast one year wherein i will be visiting him for a complete fix as per our plan so please feel free to reach out to me if you would want to check my teeth in current state or for proofs, 🙂
reply_text:
Thank you so much Manuj for taking out time for this elaborate feedback 
All the very best

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Hiten Kalra is an excellent doctor. He handled my case with due sincerity and great patience. Dr. Kalra did a great job orienting me to the process, asking for my questions, walking through what is happening right now and what to expect, and ensuring that you are fully comfortable before proceeding. Two years ago I had a very crooked smile, my both upper and lower teeth were out and not aligned for which I had to get ceramic braces. And now after the treatment is done I have a wonderful smile.

I definitely recommend Dr. Kalra.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words !! Keep Smiling 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had a great experience with Dr Hiten Kalra post my RCT for the fitment of crown. Dr Kalra has a fine ability to put you at ease and will explain each and every aspect of treatment in detail. The clinic itself is quite clean and professionally managed. I am also getting my implant treatment done here & shall strongly recommend Dr Hitesh Kalra to all of you.
